original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Views<=190 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-20 08:05:39' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-27 09:31:28' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E5.Id=E3.RelatedPostId)

CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views <= 190 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-20 08:05:39' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-27 09:31:28')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E5E3.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E5E3E6E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E5E3E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E5E3E6.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E5E3E6E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E5E3E6E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E5E3E6E4.Id)
